name: Goto Bridge
description:
LESSONS AND EXERCISES - PRACTICE - NO INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED

Discover brand-new Goto Bridge and improve your bridge game while having fun!

Playing bridge benefits your mental and physical health. In addition to stimulating your memory, developing your logic and building mental math skills, playing bridge also includes social interactions.

Did you know that bridge has even been introduced in schools? So this is not an activity reserved for seniors!

You already know the basics of bridge and you want to improve? Goto Bridge is just what you need! Follow the trend and come play bridge with us!

LESSONS AND EXERCISES

30 lessons on bidding and card play (i.e. the two main phases at bridge) prepared by bridge experts with 400 exercises to put what you learn into practice.

Each exercise comes with a commentary including the solution.

Exercises can be replayed over and over again to help you become a better player.

CUSTOMISABLE PRACTICE

With Goto Bridge you can customise your practice sessions to focus on the areas where you really need to progress.

You want to play in a specific contract type, practise a specific bidding sequence or choose card distribution at the table? Goto Bridge makes all of this possible!

NO INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED

You don’t necessarily need to be connected to the internet to use Goto Bridge.

And it offers several advantages: you play wherever and whenever you want (on board a plane, on the train, abroad, in the middle of the night...) and with no pressure. Indeed, with Goto Bridge you play at your own pace without the stress of competition as there is no other online player playing simultaneously.

EASY DEALS FOR BEGINNERS

This game mode enables you to play deals with particularly easy bidding and card play and no trap.

PRACTICE DEALS

Play deals as you want, one after the other. Some are tricky, others aren’t. This game mode is perfect to identify the areas of the game that you still need to practise. Or just enjoy!

IDEAL FEATURES TO PROGRESS

- Have your bids corrected and your card play optimised

During the bidding phase, Goto Bridge corrects your bidding cards and explains your mistakes to you. During card play, it shows you the best card to play to take the highest number of tricks on the deal.

- Get advice from Argine

Not sure? Goto Bridge AI ‘Argine’ is here to help! During the bidding phase and card play, you can ask Argine for advice at any time and it will tell you what it would do if it was in your shoes.

- Cancel the last bid or trick and go back

It can be very useful if you make a mistake!

- Claim remaining tricks at the table

You are certain you will take the remaining tricks of the deal? Claim them quickly using a dedicated button.

SET UP YOUR OWN CONVENTIONS

Many bidding systems are available in Goto Bridge: SAYC (Standard American Yellow Card), ACOL, French 5-card major, Polish Club, Nordisk standard, NBB Standaard Hoog, Forum D and 2/1.

Several profiles are available for each system: beginner, intermediate, competition and strong 2. You also have the possibility to create a free profile with your own conventions.

DEVELOPED BY BRIDGE EXPERTS

The team of developers behind Goto Bridge is not new to the game. Indeed, these bridge lovers (among them is 2017 World Bridge Championships runner-up Jérôme Rombaut) are also developing the world-famous Funbridge app.
